ValidationRule.description: Require that the tissue status be set to Eligible when setting the donation status to Sent To Tissue Bank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Donation_Process_Status__c, 'Sent To Tissue Bank'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Tissue_Eligibility_Status__c ,'Eligible')), NOT($Setup.Americord_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rule__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must set the Tissue Eligibility Status to Eligible when setting the Donation Process Status to Sent To Tissue Bank.
